name: SpaceWalk 2
description:
He is back ! 

His mission ? 

Conquer the stars !

A game with a raging look

Solo : Yes
Coop : Yes
MultiPlayers : Yes (5 Players per room max)

CONFIGURATION
minimal :

  • Intel core celeron or AMD Athlon (2.0 Ghz)
  • Intel HD graphics or Radeon Vega Graphics (750Mo)
  • 2go RAM
  • 1 go Memory .

Best :

  • Intel core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3 (3.0 Ghz)
  • Nvidia GT 730 or Radeon R7 250 (2 Go)
  • 4go RAM
  • 1 go Memory .

HOW TO PLAY

BUTTON | FUNCTION
W A S D | Move
Escape | Pause
Shift | Run
space | jump
